elements.text: You were asked to plan a fundraiser for your HDSA chapter, a task you've taken on yearly. You recently learned that you are positive for the HD gene, and the idea of running this year's event feels emotionally overwhelming. You choose to take the year off, feeling good about the decision to put yourself...

elements.name: HDSA Fundraiser_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
